title: Georgian background
creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions, Educational Foundation, Clement W. Bending and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Shows through dramatised scenes, museum pieces and contemporary architecture the way of life of English people in the eighteenth century. Dress, household objects, furnishings and re-enacted social occasions; travel by coach; the landscape showing the enclosure movement; the spinning jenny and the beginnings of the Industrial Revolution; examples of eighteenth century art.
